name: UFO穿越 （UFO Cross）
description:
The universe is full of wonders, why do brave warriors maintain world peace and drive spaceships through the universe to eliminate monsters and cosmic hooligans. At the same time, in 2025, an escort spacecraft belonging to a space prison made a forced landing on Earth, with many exiled criminals and space monsters on board. The spacecraft circled in the sky, forcing the release of space criminals and monsters. The spacecraft's isolation system was damaged during the forced landing, causing the global electronic equipment to stop working, causing space criminals to do evil everywhere, and humans worldwide to flee and massacre. At this time, Space Warrior Baldios appeared. You can save the world by controlling them!

Main features:

  • third person 3 d shooting game,The goal of the mission is to strike a group of cosmic hooligans, destroy their jammers, and then escape.
  • You only have one life. If you sacrifice, you must start anew.
  • The command center will provide you with a batch of ammunition, and it's up to you to complete the task. Good luck!
  • You can create or join server rooms to fight online with friends.
  • You can enter the world and do some interesting things.
  • You can enter the single player training ground to play the clearance version.
